lead_paragraph: Walter Byers created the college sports cartel and lived to regret it.

headline.print_headline: The Man Who Built the N.C.A.A.
headline.main: The Man Who Built the N.C.A.A.

snippet: Walter Byers created the college sports cartel and lived to regret it.
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column holds that longtime NCAA executive director Walter Byers, while considered highly successful by many during his stewardship of organization, in fact failed to protect student athletes and preserve organizaton's amateur collegiate spirit; contends bureaucracy and commercialism flourished on Byers's watch; says Byers's criticism of NCAA's flaws came late and he failed to recognize his role in creating problems.
